Package gameplay.input

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Command
    Common interface which defines how commands will be carried out.
    CommandIssuer
    Common interface to be shared across all classes that issues commands.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommandDetonateBomb
    Command to detonate a bomb.
    CommandDown
    Command to move the gameactor down.
    CommandLeft
    Command to move the GameActor left * @author mfong8
    CommandManager
    The CommandManager class is used to control the flow of commands.
    CommandPlaceBomb
    Command that instructs a GameActor to place a bomb.
    CommandRight
    Command to instruct the GameActor to move right.
    CommandUp
    Command to tell the GameActor the move up.
    InputListener
    InputListener listens to the keyboard and caches input and holds it until another system poll's the InputListener for the last command issued by the user.
